trans-unit.source: Represents the <xref uid="langword_csharp_<ReferenceList>" name="<ReferenceList>" href=""></xref> element used in XML encryption.
trans-unit.target: Hiermee geeft u de <xref uid="langword_csharp_<ReferenceList>" name="<ReferenceList>" href=""> </xref> element dat wordt gebruikt in XML-codering.

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: Deze klasse kan niet worden overgenomen.

trans-unit.source: The ReferenceList class represents the `<ReferenceList>` element of an encrypted document XML signature defined by the XML encryption specification.
trans-unit.target: De klasse ReferenceList Geeft de `<ReferenceList>` element van een versleutelde document XML-handtekening is gedefinieerd door de specificatie van XML-codering.

trans-unit.source: The ReferenceList class contains references to <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedData> and <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedKey> elements that were encrypted by a key contained within another <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedKey> element.
trans-unit.target: De klasse ReferenceList bevat verwijzingen naar <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedData>en <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedKey>elementen die zijn versleuteld met een sleutel in een andere <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedKey>element.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedKey> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedKey> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedData>

trans-unit.source: The ReferenceList class uses <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.DataReference> elements to reference <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedData> elements, and <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyReference> elements to reference <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedKey> elements.
trans-unit.target: Het gebruik van de klasse ReferenceList <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.DataReference>elementen om te verwijzen naar <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedData>elementen, en <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyReference>elementen om te verwijzen naar <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedKey>elementen.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedKey> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyReference> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedData> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.DataReference>

trans-unit.source: You can add only <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.DataReference> or <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyReference> objects to the ReferenceList collection.
trans-unit.target: U kunt alleen toevoegen <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.DataReference>of <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyReference>objecten aan de verzameling ReferenceList.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyReference> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.DataReference>

trans-unit.source: For more information about XML encryption standards, see http://www.w3.org/TR/xmlenc-core.
trans-unit.target: Zie voor meer informatie over XML-codering standaarden http://www.w3.org/TR/xmlenc-core.
